text: Edward Żuławnik (23 November 1932 - 1 September 1999) was a Polish wrestler. He competed in the men's Greco-Roman welterweight at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Polish male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Poland Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from Płońsk County Category:Sportspeople from Masovian Voivodeship
title: Edward Żuławnik
